mobs.long_desc: A cougar glares at you with deadly intent.
mobs.desc: A large, yellow cougar is trying to slink away unnoticed as you watch it.

mobs.long_desc: A large, brown bear growls angrily at you.
mobs.desc: You see a very large and hungry brown bear scavenging in the underbush. It seems to dislike your intrusion into its activities.

mobs.long_desc: An eagle soars in the sky above you.
mobs.desc: You see a majestic eagle flying right above you. You can't help but admire this great creature of the air.

mobs.long_desc: A tribesman of the cougar tribe glares at you with hostile intentions.
mobs.desc: The tribesman does not seem to like you coming into his tribe's territory. He seems ready to drive you away.

mobs.long_desc: A tribesman of the bear clan walks past you.
mobs.desc: The tribesman seems to be the very strong but dumb type. He seems to be returning home from an expedition of some sort.

mobs.long_desc: A member of the eagle tribe looks at you with an appraising eye.
mobs.desc: The tribesman stares at you from his point of vantage. He seems to be sizing you up for some reason or another.

mobs.long_desc: The shaman seems to be waiting here for something.
mobs.desc: A man of great age and wisdom is seated here. He seems to be in some sort of trance, although he is obviously aware of your presence.

mobs.long_desc: The chief of the cougar tribe busy inspecting his weapons.
mobs.desc: The chief of the cougar tribe is a very muscular, tanned middle aged man. He seems to be very capable of causing great harm to people.

mobs.long_desc: The chief of the bear clan is busy eating his fish.
mobs.desc: The chieftain of this clan is large and slow of movement, but one look at the size of his muscles and you know that you wouldn't want to rouse his anger. He spits out a fish-bone while you look at him. Perhaps you had better just leave before he takes an interest in you.

mobs.long_desc: The chief of the eagle clan is busy contemplating the world.
mobs.desc: The chief of the eagle clan is a wizened old man of great knowledge and experience. He seems to be deep in thought.

mobs.long_desc: The hunter is busy stalking his prey.
mobs.desc: The hunter is a very well equipped man. He seems to have travelled a great distance to hunt for food for his family.

mobs.long_desc: A horrible apparition stands before you.
mobs.desc: You are confronted by an apparition of your greatest fear! You feel a terrible urge to flee this place, or die in the attempt.

mobs.long_desc: The shaman's apprentice is trying to hide from something.
mobs.desc: A young boy is trying to hide here in the darkness. His eyes are large with fear and he is shivering and talking to himself. His body seems to have several partially healed wounds on it.

mobs.keywords: half frozen burning planted shrub Questmob
mobs.short_desc: a half frozen half burning shrub
mobs.long_desc: A shrub half burning and half frozen is planted here.
mobs.desc: This shrub is burning - and frozen.  It seems to be in agony, as shrubs go. On half of it there are icicles hanging from the branches and leaves, while the other half is burning is sickening fire.  It is a shame that there does not seem to be anyone willing to put out the flames.

objects.ground: A flint-headed spear lies on the ground.

extras.text: The spear is nothing more than a stick with a flint head tied at one end.  It is rather badly made and doesn't have a good balance.

objects.ground: A tomahawk lies on the ground.

extras.text: The tomahawk is a crudely made axe.  Although it is not very sharp, it is rather easy to use.
The head-dress is decorated with a multitude of very colourful feathers, giving it an aura of magnificence.

objects.ground: A shaman's staff has been left unattended.

extras.text: The shaman's staff is heavily decorated with many runes of mystical origin. You get a feeling of well-being when you touch the item.

objects.ground: A carnivore's tooth lies half hidden on the ground.

extras.text: The tooth looks like some sort of earring, as small runes are carved on its yellowed ivory surface.

objects.ground: A sharp claw lies on the ground.

extras.text: The bear's claw is yellowed with age.  There are also very strange etchings on its' surface.

objects.ground: An eagle's feather rests on the ground.

extras.text: You sense that there is more to this feather than meets the eye.  Just touching it gives you a tingling feeling.

objects.ground: A clear potion has been left behind.
A clear mask is lying on the ground.

extras.text: The mask shimmers slightly as you hold it up and you see yourself reflected. There seems to be a subtle difference between what you see and how you remember yourself to appear to others.  Perhaps this is the real you.

objects.ground: A moss-covered pool is hidden behind a large rock here.

extras.text: Small symbols carved into the rock are barely visible below the water.  One is a four-pointed sun symbol, and below it is an inverted triangle with circles on each of its sides.  Beneath the sun are even smaller letters that say "The Canyon, by Timun circa 1993" and beneath the triangle it says "Escape route by Kourrya circa 2006".

A small pool is hidden from plain sight behind a large rock here.  The water is cold, but moss and lichens grow in abundance around it.  It is much deeper than it first appears - the bottom of the pool cannot be reached, even with a long stick.  On one side of the pool's wall, beneath the water, some obscure petroglyphs can be seen.

triggers.name: fetch_is_dead
triggers.commands: mteleport %actor% 17868 msend %actor% Your vision suddenly blurs, and you find yourself back at the shaman. mforce %actor% look if !%get.mob_count[17806]% mat 17868 mload mob 17806 endif mat 17868 mforce shaman say Well done, %actor.name%! mat 17868 mforce shaman mload obj 17809 mat 17868 mforce shaman say You have passed the test and earned this. mat 17868 mforce shaman give mask-self-knowledge %actor.name%

triggers.name: shaman_speak1
triggers.commands: if %self.fighting% say Your test may begin when mine has finished! else if %get.mob_count[17811]% say I'm sorry.  I'm already helping someone else face their fears. say You may try when they are finished. else say It is your right to face your fears. say Let us hope you have the power to overcome them. wait 1s msend %actor% Everything blurs for a second as the shaman gestures. mteleport %actor% 17869 emote gestures, and %actor.name% disappears in a blur. mat 17869 mforce %actor% look wait 1s msend %actor% &b%self.name% tells you, 'If you need to leave, my apprentice will show you the way out.'&0 mat 17872 mload mob 17811 if !%get.mob_count[17812]% mat 17872 mload mob 17812 endif endif endif

triggers.name: shaman_speak2
triggers.commands: say This is no easy test, and many have failed. sigh wait 1s say My last student still hasn't returned, but I know he is not yet dead. consider %actor.name% if %actor.level% < 18 say I strongly suggest that you do not attempt this test yet. wait 1s endif say If you are certain you wish to continue, then say "Master let the test begin".

triggers.name: shaman_greet1
triggers.commands: *Add: Kourrya 6-06 for the troll mask quest in Minithawkin if %actor.race% /= troll mjunk red-dye mload obj 37081 end eval minlevel (%wandstep% - 1) * 10 wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% == %wandstep% && %actor.level% >= %minlevel% if %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:greet]% == 0 mecho %self.name% says, 'I see you're crafting something.  If you want my help, we can talk about &6&b[upgrades]&0.' else say Do you have what I need? endif else say Have you come to face your greatest fear? endif

triggers.name: apprentice_speak1
triggers.commands: comfort %actor.name% say Maybe another time you will succeed. emote utters the words 'rednes ot nruter'. mteleport %actor.name% 17868 mat fetch-apparition mpurge fetch-apparition mforce %actor% look

triggers.name: apprentice_speak2
triggers.commands: say If you want to return to the shaman say 'I have failed my quest'. wait 1 say Then I will return you to the shaman.

triggers.name: apprentice_greet1
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 sigh emote mumbles to himself about completing his training. say If you need help, just ask. else flee endif

triggers.name: burning_frozen_bush_rand
triggers.commands: mecho Pitiful wails of pain scream from the burning part of the shrub. wait 2 emote moans as best as shrubs can moan.

rooms.name: Beside the River
rooms.description: This low rise overlooks a swift flowing river.  From this vantage point one one could easily launch a watercraft, in hopes of navigating this waterway. The river has cut deep into river has cut deep into the land, leaving a very deep and narrow gorge.

rooms.name: On the River
rooms.description: The river flows southwards with such power through here that it would be impossible to try and move upstream.  There is a small, rickety, wooden bridge that crosses the river to the north.  There is a landing area on the western bank.

rooms.name: Mount Gladstone
rooms.description: You stand about half way up Mount Gladstone, one of the easier mountains in this range to climb, hence its' name.  The view here is fantastic!  The river meanders all over the land and finally opens out into a lake of some sort. Throughout the valley below, smoke rises from fires in small villages spread all over this canyon.

rooms.name: Foot of the Mountain Range
rooms.description: You find yourself standing on rocky ground and peering upwards towards the mountains with looms majestically above you. There seems to be no way to cross this range, but you notice a goat path leading in an east-west direction. The path leads upwards to end somewhere in the middle of a peak.

rooms.name: Foot of the Mountain Range
rooms.description: You find yourself standing on rocky ground and peering upwards towards the mountains with looms majestically above you. There seems to be no way to cross this range, but you notice a goat path leading in an east-west direction.

rooms.name: Foot of the Mountain Range
rooms.description: You find yourself standing on rocky ground and peering upwards towards the mountains with looms majestically above you. There seems to be no way to cross this range, but you notice a goat path leading in an east-west direction.

rooms.name: Foot of the Mountain Range
rooms.description: You find yourself standing on rocky ground and peering upwards towards the mountains with looms majestically above you. There seems to be no way to cross this range, but you notice a goat path leading in an east-west direction.

rooms.name: Foot of the Mountain Range
rooms.description: You find yourself standing on rocky ground and peering upwards towards the mountains with looms majestically above you. There seems to be no way to cross this range, but you notice a goat path leading in an east-west direction.

rooms.name: Foot of the Mountain Range
rooms.description: You find yourself standing on rocky ground and peering upwards towards the mountains with looms majestically above you. There seems to be no way to cross this range, but you notice a goat path leading in an east-south direction. The land to the south seems to be less steep.

rooms.name: Gorge Path
rooms.description: You stand upon a path extending along the sides of the gorge. The river rages about 100 feet below you. Even from that distance, you can appreciate the sheer power contained in that body of water. The path continues to the south.

rooms.name: River Bend
rooms.description: The river has cut a deep gorge in the land and traveling on the river has begun to get rougher. Steep walls of stone rise on both side of the river, making landfall here impossible. The river continues in a sharp bend towards the east. Just downstream you hear the sound of cascading water.

rooms.name: Edge of the Waterfall
rooms.description: You find yourself at the edge of a waterfall. The sheer strength of the current makes it impossible for you to turn back. The only thing you can do is to ride this fall out.

Down.description: You see a foaming pool of water below.

rooms.name: Below the Waterfall
rooms.description: You managed to survive the fall down the waterfall, but you are soaked to the skin from the experience. The pool you find yourself in is rather calm, and there is an outlet flowing to the south. The cliffs still loom high above you and the only route available to you is to continue following to river.

rooms.name: Sand Bank
rooms.description: You stand upon the sandy bank of the river. The land slopes upwards from this point to the north and the east to end several feet above the water. To the north, you can see a great mountain range, its' peaks hidden in the clouds.

rooms.name: A Ledge
rooms.description: From this ledge, you can see the river running below you, like a white-blue ribbon. A short distance from here, you see that if you continue following the river, you would hit the rapids. The river bends towards the south and out of your sight.

rooms.name: The Rapids
rooms.description: You are tossed around like a cork. Your stomach feels like it wants to expel all its contents. You hope you are able to survive this. The  current is too strong for you to fight. It looks like you have to sit this one out.

rooms.name: The Rapids
rooms.description: You are tossed around like a cork. Your stomach feels like it wants to expel all its contents. You hope you are able to survive this. The  current is too strong for you to fight. It looks like you have to sit this one out.

rooms.name: Foothills
rooms.description: You gaze at the land around you. To the north, tall mountains bar your way. To the south and east, there are rocky foothill, with very sparse vegetation. Below you to the west, lies the river which carved its passage in this desolate piece of land. However, from here, you can see vast tracts of vegetation on the other bank of the river. Who said grass wasn't greener on the other side.

rooms.name: Low Hills
rooms.description: This small hill overlooks a small valley just a short distance to the south. You notice wisps of smoke at the far end of the valley. A short distance to the southeast, you see the traces of limestone caves.

rooms.name: Bend in the Path
rooms.description: The path you are following has come to a bend and continues to extend to the east. Deep below you, you also notice that the river is also at a bend. The rock here is probably much harder to be able to divert the river like that.

rooms.name: Gorge Path
rooms.description: The path continues to wind towards the east. Just ahead, you can hear a waterfall.

rooms.name: Waterfall View
rooms.description: You have come to the famous Waterfall View of the Great Gorge. To the northeast, you see a beautiful waterfall around 50 feet high cascading to a pool below. You cannot help but to admire the view. The only way to go is back to the west.

rooms.name: River Bend
rooms.description: You arrive at another bend in the river. This one flow more gently then the last one you encountered, although you can hear the sounds of rapids some distance ahead.

rooms.name: On the River
rooms.description: The river continues to flow in a east-west course. Towards the east, you hear the very loud sounds of rapids. The bank to the north is relatively low and it is possible to land there.

rooms.name: The River
rooms.description: The water just ahead of you is very very rough. It's the rapids! The very sound of the rushing waters scares the hell out of you. There is still time to turn back.

rooms.name: The Rapids
rooms.description: You are tossed around like a cork. Your stomach feels like it wants to expel all its contents. You hope you are able to survive this. The  current is too strong for you to fight. It looks like you have to sit this one out.

rooms.name: The River
rooms.description: You are at the other end of the rapids. The current is too strong for you to fight upstream, but that may be for the best. After all, you do want to keep your lunch in. The river continues to flow peacefully towards the south.

rooms.name: Foothills
rooms.description: You are on some low hills to the east of a very dangerous looking part of the river. To the east of here you can see a valley which looks like it has some sort of settlement in it. To the south you can see a place where you might be able to get onto the river.

rooms.name: Cougar Valley
rooms.description: The valley looks peaceful and pleasant, but somehow, you cannot shake of a feeling of hostility and danger. To the east, you see the opening of the system of limestone caves. To the south, you see signs of human habitation.

rooms.name: Rocky Ledge
rooms.description: You find yourself on a rocky ledge overlooking the river. The sound of all that water is deafening. The ledge continues to extend towards the east.

rooms.name: Rocky Ledge
rooms.description: You find yourself on a rocky ledge overlooking the river. The sound of all that water is deafening. The ledge continues to extend from east to west. You can see the rapids beneath you. To fall now would be, well, unpleasant.

rooms.name: Rocky Ledge
rooms.description: You find yourself on a rocky ledge overlooking the river. The sound of all that water is deafening. The ledge continues to extend from east to west. You can see the rapids beneath you. To fall now would be, well, unpleasant.

rooms.name: Rocky Ledge
rooms.description: You find yourself on a rocky ledge overlooking the river. The sound of all that water is deafening. The ledge has come to a dead end. The only way back is to the west. You can see the rapids beneath you. To fall now would be, well, unpleasant.

rooms.name: The River
rooms.description: You are at the other end of the rapids. The current is too strong for you to fight upstream, but that may be for the best. After all, you do want to keep your lunch in. The river continues to flow peacefully towards the south. The shore at the eastern bank seems to be low enough to make landfall.

rooms.name: Sand Bank
rooms.description: You stand upon the sandy bank of the river. The land rises into hills all around you. To the east, you see wisps of smoke rising, perhaps from a settlement of some sort. The river is to the west

rooms.name: Cougar Village
rooms.description: You find yourself in the middle of a small village. Tents and dwellings of all shapes and sizes are scattered all over. There is a strong smell of excrement in the air, but the inhabitants here do not seem to notice. Prominent in the centre of the village is a large totem pole.

extras.text: The totem-pole is a large pice of timber an armswidth in size and about 20 feet tall. At the top of the pole, the carved head of a cougar stares proudly towards the east.

rooms.name: Hills
rooms.description: You are on low hill overlooking the river and its banks. The fresh air and cool breeze makes you want to stay on here and forget all your worries. Just to the west, a vast expanse of trees covers the ground. The thick underbrush there also makes travel a little difficult. But why go into a forest when you can enjoy the plains?

rooms.name: Hills by the River
rooms.description: From where you are standing, you are able to look down onto the river. Far to the east, you are able to make out the second waterfall of this river. The sight is absolutely breath-taking. To the north is a thin strip of rocky ground extending from east to west. To the south, you can see the river bank.

rooms.name: Below the Waterfall
rooms.description: You are the bottom of the second waterfall. A fine spray of water wets your clothing, but it feels rather refreshing. The pool you are in drains out towards the south.

rooms.name: Edge of the Waterfall
rooms.description: You are near the end of another waterfall. This one is not as majestic as the first, but it would still be a rough ride down. The current here is not as strong, so you are able to turn back.

Down.description: You see a foaming pool of water.

rooms.name: River Bend
rooms.description: The river has cut a deep gorge in the land and traveling on the river has begun to get rougher. Steep walls of stone rise on both side of the river, making landfall here impossible. The river continues in a gentle bend towards the west.

rooms.name: Low Hills
rooms.description: You are on a rise just above the river.  The ground here is too high for you to enter the river, but a short distance to the north, it looks low enough for you to launch a boat in it.

rooms.name: Low Hills
rooms.description: This small hill overlooks a small valley just a short distance to the north. You notice wisps of smoke at the bottom of the valley. The river is some distance to the west.

rooms.name: Eagle Village
rooms.description: You have come across the village of the eagle tribe. They seem to be rather simple and relatively peaceful people. Their dwellings are built upon the branches of the trees here.

rooms.name: Hills
rooms.description: You are on low hill overlooking the river and its banks. The fresh air and cool breeze makes you want to stay on here and forget all your worries. Just to the west, you can see signs of human habitation among the trees.

rooms.name: River Bank
rooms.description: The sand feels nice beneath your feet. The air too has a refreshing smell. The are low hills rising to the north and west of here. The river flows at your east.

rooms.name: On the River
rooms.description: From this point, you see that the western bank of the river consists mainly of dense forests and gently rolling hills. The river continues to flow southwards.

rooms.name: Hills
rooms.description: You are on low hill overlooking the river and its banks. The fresh air and cool breeze makes you want to stay on here and forget all your worries. Just to the west, a vast expanse of trees covers the ground. The thick underbrush there also makes travel a little difficult. But why go into a forest when you can enjoy the plains?

rooms.name: River Bank
rooms.description: The sand feels nice beneath your feet. The air too has a refreshing smell. The are low hills rising to the south and west of here. The river flows at your east.

rooms.name: On the River
rooms.description: From this point, you see that the western bank of the river consists mainly of dense forests and gently rolling hills. The river continues to flow southwards.

rooms.name: Hills
rooms.description: You are on low hill overlooking the river and its banks. The fresh air and cool breeze makes you want to stay on here and forget all your worries. Just to the south and west, a vast expanse of trees covers the ground. The thick underbrush there also makes travel a little difficult. But why go into a forest when you can enjoy the plains?

rooms.name: Hills
rooms.description: You are on low hill overlooking the river and its banks. The fresh air and cool breeze makes you want to stay on here and forget all your worries. Just to the south, a vast expanse of trees covers the ground. The thick underbrush there also makes travel a little difficult. But why go into a forest when you can enjoy the plains?

rooms.name: River Bend
rooms.description: The river has begun to bend towards the east. Just downstream you can hear the sounds of another waterfall. To the south, you can see signs of habitation, but you are unable to make landfall here. Perhaps further downstream.

rooms.name: Edge of the Waterfall
rooms.description: Another waterfall can be seen to the east, but it is a lot smaller than any of the previous ones. You think it would be dangerous going down here but you can always turn back as the current is not very strong now.

Down.description: You see a foaming pool of water below.

rooms.name: Large Pool
rooms.description: The pool at the bottom of this waterfall is rather calm, in spite of the large volume of water entering it all the time. You realise that you would soon be leaving the canyon and entering the great unknown beyond. The river flows gently to the east.

rooms.name: On the River
rooms.description: It feels very relaxing and peaceful following the river now. The river continues to flow towards a bend to the east. You could, however, choose to make landfall as the southern bank is rather low.

rooms.name: Gentle Bend
rooms.description: The river now bends towards the south and is heading towards the ocean.

rooms.name: Bear Village
rooms.description: You find yourself in the middle of the village of the bear tribe.  The smell here is overpowering.  Discarded pieces of meat are lying all over the place, and there are fish bones everywhere.  To the north you hear the river slightly above you.  To the west, a rocky path begins.  It looks like it may lead out of the canyon.

rooms.name: The Ursa Plains
rooms.description: You'd better watch out, for you are now in bear country. It is rumoured that the bears here are vicious, and would tear your limbs off with one bite. The plains are spread all around you, but your passage to the north is blocked by the river.

rooms.name: The Ursa Plains
rooms.description: You'd better watch out, for you are now in bear country. It is rumoured that the bears here are vicious, and would tear your limbs off with one bite. The plains are spread all around you, but your passage to the north is blocked by the river.

rooms.name: River Bank
rooms.description: You are on a sand bank near the river bend. There are plains to the west and south interspersed with the occasional tree. Strangely, there is a strong smell of urine here.

rooms.name: On the River
rooms.description: The river now flows towards the ocean just beyond. You could try your sefaring skills and journey forth, or turn back now.

rooms.name: The Ursa Plains
rooms.description: You'd better watch out, for you are now in bear country. It is rumoured that the bears here are vicious, and would tear your limbs off with one bite. To the west, a mountain range bars your way. To the north, you can see the signs of human activity.

rooms.name: The Ursa Plains
rooms.description: You'd better watch out, for you are now in bear country. It is rumoured that the bears here are vicious, and would tear your limbs off with one bite. The plains are spread all around you and it feels nice to be able to walk on such open grounds.

rooms.name: The Ursa Plains
rooms.description: You'd better watch out, for you are now in bear country. It is rumoured that the bears here are vicious, and would tear your limbs off with one bite. The plains are spread all around you and it feels nice to be able to walk on such open grounds.

rooms.name: The Ursa Plains
rooms.description: You'd better watch out, for you are now in bear country. It is rumoured that the bears here are vicious, and would tear your limbs off with one bite. The plains are spread all around you, but your passage to the east is blocked by the river.

rooms.name: River Mouth
rooms.description: The river comes to a head here, forming a wide mouth.  An offshoot flows off to the east, across a narrow, rocky ford, but it is inaccessible from here. The river flows from the north.

rooms.name: Dark Cave
rooms.description: You find yourself in a very dark cave. There is an eerie feeling here, like you are not alone. Everytime you take a step, there is a crunching sound, but your light does not reveal anything.

rooms.name: Dark Cavern
rooms.description: You are now in a chamber somewhere in this cavern system. Strangely, there are paintings of some sort on the walls here. A passageway leads to the east, deeper into the caverns.

extras.text: The pictures are very crudely done, with motives of various animals. The cougar, bear and eagle are quite common among the myriad pictures. You realise that some of them are painted in blood.

rooms.name: The Caverns
rooms.description: The cavern leads deeper to the east. Somehow, it feels a little difficult to think straight here. Must be something in the air.

rooms.name: The Caverns
rooms.description: The cavern leads deeper to the north. Somehow, it feels a little difficult to think straight here. Must be something in the air.

rooms.name: The Caverns
rooms.description: You have come to a dead end. The only way you can go is back to the south. There is an almost suffocating atmosphere here. You'd be glad to get out of this place.

rooms.name: On Top of Mount Gladstone
rooms.description: You are standing atop Mount Gladstone. There's not much of a view from here, as you are almost completely surrounded by taller mountains here. A winding trail runs north and south from here. The wind from the north is hard and dry. The wind from the south feels much cooler.

rooms.name: On the Side of Mount Gladstone
rooms.description: You are standing on a small stone bridge crossing a very fast river. To the south it looks as though you can enter the river at a small landing. The path continues to the east and to the west.

rooms.name: At the Foot of Mount Gladstone
rooms.description: This is the foot of the mountain. The climb to the south would look formidable to most people, but it's possible. There's no other way visible to cross the mountain range around here. A soft path is visible to the north.

rooms.name: On the Side of Mount Gladstone
rooms.description: You stand on a bend in the path, which continues east and south. To the south it looks as though you can enter the river.

rooms.name: A Narrow Path
rooms.description: A narrow, rocky path leads east and west here along the edge of the canyon. The rank smell of old meat flows in from the east, where huts of the Bear Tribe take up a corner of the Ursa Plains.  Sagebrush and tiny flowers make up the vegetation around here, and from far off comes the sound of rushing water.

rooms.name: A Narrow Path
rooms.description: The path leads east from here towards Bear Village and directly up the canyon wall.  Large boulders provide steady handholds and footholds going up, and the canyon walls are dotted with scraggly trees and a few other plants. The distant sound of rushing water is an undertone to the other sounds of nature.

rooms.name: On the Canyon Wall
rooms.description: A narrow, rocky path leads to the west and directly down over several large boulders here.  It does not look well-traveled, judging by the shoots of sage and nettles growing in the middle of the path.  Looking to the east, the glimmer of riverwater is barely visible over the huts of the Bear Tribe.

rooms.name: A Rocky Path
rooms.description: A narrow path runs east-west along the side of the canyon wall here.  Bare rock just out from either side of the path as the canyon rises far above, blocking sunlight from reaching the path most of the day.  Hardy plants thrive in this environment, however; many of the crevices are filled with lichens and small, pungent herbs grow wherever dirt gathers.  Far to the east, the canyon opens up into tribal lands.

rooms.name: The Rocky Scree
rooms.description: Loose rubble leads up here, looking quite unsafe.  Walking quickly might cause an avalanche here, so it would be good to be careful.  East, the path seems more stable though it is just as narrow.  Far off to the east, smoke rises over the Ursa Plains and water glimmers.  It is difficult to see what is beyond the rocky scree to the west.

rooms.name: A Narrow Path to the Canyon
rooms.description: Nearly out of the canyon, the narrow trail leads south towards a dark wood and down a rocky scree to the canyon and the village of the Bear tribe. Plants seem more abundant here than farther down the path, probably because the sun is not blocked as much.  It smells faintly of fresh water, though no water source is in plain vision - perhaps a scent from the river down below?

rooms.name: A Steep Rocky Trail
rooms.description: This steep, rocky path leads north toward a great canyon.  Thick sagebrush nearly hides it from view, and it does not look like an easy climb.  The canyon walls which begin to rise here are composed of granite and sandstone, with the sandstone wearing slowly away to form the deep, fertile canyon.  Lichens cover the rocks in many colors and a sweet scent fills the air.

rooms.name: Hillside Path
rooms.description: The hillside here is rocky and supports only a few straggly bushes.  A path from the south curves here toward a steep drop to the east.  It looks used, but not so much that the earth has been ground into dust.  Purple flowers grow here and there in the short grasses.

rooms.name: Light Forest Path
rooms.description: A light forest of oaks and birches grows thinly on this hillside.  The land slopes down to the east.  A mighty boulder, as big as a hill, looms to the west.  The path looks lightly traveled and there is little overgrowth or debris on it.

rooms.name: Forest Path
rooms.description: A dark forest surrounds the area, where a light path runs north and west through the undergrowth.  The forest looks darker and larger to the west, and seems to thin a bit to the northeast.  The land is somewhat sloping here, down to the east.

rooms.name: Path by a Boulder
rooms.description: A giant boulder lies to the north.  A footpath hugs its southern edge here, running along the base of the rock.  A vast forest lies to the south.  Tall trees overshadow the path and the cool air that sits quietly below.  Deep scratches in the bark of a nearby tree betray the presence of bears.

rooms.name: Forest Path
rooms.description: A footpath runs along the base of a mighty boulder to the northeast.  Trees grow thick all around.  There is little sound, for the air is still and there is no sign of nearby running water.  Thick underbrush grows through a layer of leaves and other litter on the ground.

rooms.name: Forest Path
rooms.description: Huge dark trees tower above.  A shaded path runs below them.  Here, the path enters from the west and turns south, for a steep hill or giant boulder lies to the east.  The quiet of the land is broken only by the occasional birdcall. Mosses hang from low tree branches, and lichens coat the nearby boulders.

rooms.name: A Path in the Woods
rooms.description: A meandering path wanders through the undergrowth.  The thick dark trees of the forest crowd inward and block out the sun.  The sounds of wildlife may be heard from time to time, but otherwise the forest is silent.  The path does not look well-traveled, but is not much overgrown.
